title: Fuck that new client.
body:
well, let start
that new clinet destroy my mmr, i am full of leave busters and can t play a fucking normal game, first problem is because clinet doesn t open and i need to delete files and repair all time when i want to play, in second place the client is bugged, when i try to select game type i can t join in the lobby, after in champ select client freeze for a 2 or 3 minutes, and my last problem is in gameplay when all fking effects and spells and action are bugged, i kill a minion and i see the gold after 5 sec or i die and character remain there, the animations are delayed. {{item:2050}}

replies.body: It sounds like you're having issues spread out to both the client as well as the game, and the main cause seems to be a pretty unstable connection.  Your network seems to be struggling to access our services, so a reinstall wouldn't really fix this.  Instead, you'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Definitely make sure to test it out in a custom game before returning to matchmaking, though!
